responses: Hello, welcome to Ichi Restaurants. How may I help you?

Yes we offer free wifi to all our customers

patterns: Can I park my car at your restaurant
responses: We do offer parking and valet services.
Yes we have elevators accessible to our customers.
Our restaurant has centralised climate control

Our restaurant is at 48-37 Aza, Kabayama, Sapparo

patterns: When can I come in today?
responses: We are open from 11 AM to 11PM on weekdays and 11AM to Midnight on Weekends
We are open everyday from 11AM to 11PM, Weekends we are open till Midnight

Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
We hope to see you at one of our restaurants
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

patterns: What kinds of items are there?

We have coffee and tea

We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?

We do not do delivery's as of now

patterns: How do I book a table

patterns: What kind of drinks are available?

patterns: Do you have any age restrictions?
responses: We do not have any age restrictions however, we do not serve alcohol to under age customers

We have a live band playing every day

patterns: How many people can fit on one table?
responses: Per table we can seat 4 people but tables can be combined to accommodate more people
As per government regulation we do not permit smoking inside the premises
We have 4 seperate washrooms for Gender Neutral, Handicap, Men and Women

responses: Water is served free of charge
